title: all things SKIN: acne, product recs, our skin journeys
itunes:title: all things SKIN: acne, product recs, our skin journeys
description:
Brooke and Danielle are back this week catching up on their recent trip to Nantucket!  The gals are getting into all the silliness from their recent trip, and then shifting gears to talk about SKIN and skincare with CeraVe.  Dermatologist Dr. Mian joins the gals to talk about washing your face, skincare and so much more.  Enjoy the episode and be sure to tag @galsonthegopodcast in your listening selfies and stories on Instagram!

Please support the show by checking out our sponsors!

BetterHelp: Our listeners get 10% off their first month at BetterHelp.com/GALS

Athletic Greens: Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase. Visit athleticgreens.com/GALS

Enter the GOTG x CeraVe GIVEAWAY! https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/ 
Check out Dr. Mian: https://www.instagram.com/drmianskin/ 

Thanks to CeraVe for working with us on this episode! 

SHOP GOTG MERCH!  https://fanjoy.co/collections/gals-on-the-go  


GOTG jams playlist https://open.spotify.com/playlist/1vQ4FvPya39ff8SOGK9Dg9?si=87f7bd7fbc4445fd 


GOTG YouTube Channel (watch full episodes with video!)  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkCy3xcN257Hb_VWWU5C5vA
